new.text: Mythic
subPoints: Initial support for Mythic rarity, ranks and abilities has arrived.
There's likely to be bugs and some overlooked features. Please be patient and feel free report in the Tacticus Planner Discord, or in the main Tacticus Discord.

new.text: (laserian403) Added Emperor's Children faction to the planner
subPoints: Added Lucius, the Eternal character with full LRE (Legendary Release Event) support
Added Emperor's Children base upgrades and their campaign node locations

new.text: (laserian403) Added Atlacoya character to Adeptus Custodes faction
(laserian403) Added Learn > Equipment page
subPoints: New comprehensive equipment reference page
Shows equipment icons and types for better visualization

new.text: (unrstuart) Enhanced LRE planner functionality
subPoints: Added ability to toggle individual rows in a track or entire columns
Improved user experience for LRE progress tracking

new.text: (laserian403) Updated events calendar with latest images
subPoints: Added calendar images for June and July 2025
Improved calendar display on home page

minor.text: (laserian403) Added tacticusId for Exorcist MOW to improve API sync compatibility
(laserian403) Updated LRE dates and stages for current events

bugFixes.text: (laserian403) Fixed LRE crash when invalid characters are selected

new.text: (laserian403) Added Adeptus Custodes faction to the planner, and their 3 new units - Aesoth, Kariyan and Trajann
(laserian403) Added Healer/Mechanic trait icons to LRE planner

bugFixes.text: (Hecubha) Fixed React hooks error in learn > guild page

new.text: Added 1.28 update data
subPoints: (cpunerd) Significant shuffle of upgrade materials in elite nodes. Changes to normal/mirror nodes are not yet known/shown.
(laserian403) Added [Dark Angels] Forcas Oathsworn, Inner Circle Companion, unlockable in the ‘Inner Circle’ event, starting on May 11
(laserian403) Added Upcoming Legendary Release Event, starting on June 1

new.text: (cpunerd) Added 'Learn > Versus' page
subPoints: This page is a major work in progress.
Pick two characters/NPCs, select rank and rarity, see how much damage one does to the other.

new.text: (cpunerd) Added 1.27 update data
subPoints: Added [World Eaters] Tarvakh, Master of Executions, unlockable in the ‘For the Blood God’ event, starting on April 6
Added [Genestealer Cults] Judh Lhaska, Kelermorph, unlockable via the Battle Pass starting on 30th of March
Added New Campaign Event: ‘Tyranids’ — Starting April 3

new.text: (cpunerd) Added 'Learn > NPCs' page
(cpunerd) Improved 'Learn > Campaigns'
subPoints: Added more details about enemies to 'Learn > Campaigns'. Currently Indomitus, Indomitus Mirror, and Fall of Cadia are complete. The rest are in progress. Thanks to Towen for the data collection.
Made the page mobile friendly.

new.text: (cpunerd) Improved Character Stats.
subPoints: Added character stats in the details page under 'Input > Who You Own'. Equipment is not yet considered.
Added character stats at configurable level under 'Learn > Characters'.
Added DAMVAR against zero armor and infinite armor under expanded character stats at 'Learn > Characters.'

new.text: (cpunerd) Plan > Campaign Progression
subPoints: Added 'Plan > Campaign Progression' to the mobile site.
Fixed a bug with incorrectly calculated savings in campaign progression for extremis nodes in campaign events.

new.text: (laserian403) Added Plague Burst Crawler to the 'Who You Own' page.

minor.text: (irvinesj) Updated duplicate upgrades handling.

bugFixes.text: Fixed upgrades syncing via Tacticus API for some crafted upgrades.
Fixed bug with daily raids upgrades order while syncing with Tacticus API.

new.text: Updated Nandi's Dirty Dozen to February 2025 data
subPoints: Added possibility to switch between older versions of the Dirty Dozen
Added Guild Raid team affiliation

minor.text: Added Buy Me a coffee (trooper) widget to home screen

bugFixes.text: Fixed issue with Exremis campaign raids being overridden. (Reported by František)

new.text: Added Dante character and LRE. Thank to cpunerd (Kharnage) for helping.

minor.text: Updated Extremis campaign event nodes drop rate. Thank to FMG for giving a hand.
[cpunerd] Updated reward for Indomitus Mirror Elite 7 from Psychic Force Conduit to Archeo-Tech Remnant. (Reported by SeventhSun)
Added "Sync" button to daily raids UI to simplify sync on mobile version. (Requested by Szarekh)
Updated daily raids settings custom locations selector to include Extremis and Indomitus early nodes

bugFixes.text: Fixed issue with guides instances not opening and causing page go blank. (Reported by ImYaHuckleberry)
Fixed issue with API sync not updating locked characters shards
Fixed issue with API sync after which daily raids recommended to add values with negative numbers. (Reported by BlatantFix)
Fixed issue with API sync not updating inventory upgrades with zero values. (Reported by Janson)
[cpunerd] Fixed upgrades images are size on Campaign Progression page. (Reported by Juan)

new.text: Welcome to cpunerd, our newest Contributor, who made significant contributions in this update!
[cpunerd] Introduced the Campaign Progression feature to simplify campaign planning.
subPoints: You can navigate to the page via Plan -> Campaign Progression.
Found this page helpful? Consider using cpunerd's Refer-A-Friend code 'DUG-38-VAT'.

new.text: First Campaign Event: ‘Adeptus Mechanicus’
subPoints: Track progress on the "My Progress" page. Campaign Progress is renamed to My Progress
Added a 'Campaign Event' option in Daily Raids settings. Select your current Campaign Event for tailored raid suggestions.

new.text: Added new collectible characters
subPoints: [Genestealer Cults] Isaak Starn, the Primus, unlockable in the ‘Path of Ascension’ event starting January 26.
[Adeptus Mechanicus] Sy-Gex, Kathaphron Destroyer.

new.text: Updated LRE dates
subPoints: [Genestealer Cults] The Patermine, Genestealer Patriarch, unlockable in the second ‘Alien Majesty’ event starting February 16.

minor.text: Added option to display core characters of each campaign on the My Progress page
Resolved issue with page redirection which should improve time of initial page load.
Updated Learn Campaigns page to include new Campaign Event and some UI adjustments.
Added "Points Calculations" options to the LRE leaderboard and LRE master table
subPoints: "Unearned Points Only" - works only for selected characters, calculates points that specific character can score based on number of battles that left uncompleted.
"All Points" - works only for all characters, calculates points that specific character can score overall.

bugFixes.text: [cpunerd] Fixed LRE Leaderboard sorting by name issue. (Reported by Morpholine)
Corrected names for Tyranids: Parasite of Mortrex and Winged Tyranid Prime. (Reported by SeventhSun)
[cpunerd] Resolved improper handling of rankStart=Locked in Rank Lookup. (Reported by SeventhSun)
[cpunerd] Fixed issue with Raids filter suggesting common upgrades incorrectly. (Reported by SeventhSun)
[cpunerd] Corrected a typo in Arjac's name. (Reported by WarAvatar)
[cpunerd] Fixed UI alignment issue where inventory section items were not centered. (Reported by SeventhSun)
Resolved logic issue causing 'Conflict - server overwrite' spam on mobile. (Reported by Tani)
Fixed Patermine Limited Event missions. (Reported by SeventhSun)
Updated the image for the Overcapacitator crafted upgrade. (Reported by Frenzy87)

new.text: Added new collectable character
subPoints: [Blood Angels] Nicodemus, Sanguinary Priest, unlockable in the ‘Insanguination’ event, starting December 22

new.text: Updated LRE dates
subPoints: [Blood Angels] Mephiston, Lord of Death, unlockable in the second ‘Angels of Death‘ event, starting January 12

new.text: Updates according to balancing changes
subPoints: Morvenn Vahl, stats changes and changed melee attack hits from 5 to 2
Azrael, stats changes
Pestillian, stats changes, Normal melee attack changed from Direct Damage to Toxic and Replaced Putrid Explosion trait with Explodes trait

minor.text: Updated LRE master table and leaderboard tables to not take into account extra points from the Defeat All enemies requirement (SeventhSun)
For mobile devices reduced server push debounce time to one second instead of 10 seconds (Tani)
Added LRE track names to LRE teams table (SeventhSun)
Updated Inventory to show basic and crafted upgrades in separate columns (Peuchy)
Updated Inventory sections to be expandable and collapsable

bugFixes.text: Corrected Anuphet stats values (Medon)
Fixed issue with Shards campaign nodes not being filtered according to the filter settings on the Daily Raids page (Peuchy)
Fixed issue with LRE UI x/14 shows as undefined/14 (SeventhSun)
Fixed issue with LRE Completed Tracks not filtered from teams (Kinks)

new.text: Updated Daily Raids filter to recommend locations by enemies types and enemies count
subPoints: Thanks to all volunteers that helped collect data: SeventhSun, VitaMorte, Unlucky☆SirEldricIV, Cody212501

minor.text: Updated Learn Campaigns table to include data about enemies types and enemies count

bugFixes.text: Fixed issue with LRE planner when selection doesn't merge correctly on table view (SeventhSun)

new.text: Added new collectable units
subPoints: Hollan, the Biophagus, unlockable in the ’Path of Ascension' event, starting November 17
Shas'vre Vior'la Tson'ji, XV88 Broadside Battlesuit, unlockable in the Incursion event starting December 2
Parasite of Mortrex (PoM), Invader Organism, unlockable in the (Epic!) Battle Pass season starting on December 15

new.text: Added new Campaign Battles: ‘Mirror Elite Saim-Hann’ part 5
Re-designed LRE planner UI/UX
subPoints: Updated table view and added new card view
Added possibility to have multiple teams per track
Updated settings to have more granular LRE unit tile view settings
Updated progress view to be more compact and added intermediate state

minor.text: Updated Dirty Dozen table. Thanks ijriims for contribution
Updated characters icons that has been cropped. Thanks to Tech Priest Fred for providing icons

bugFixes.text: Fixed issue with missing damage types and traits on the Characters page (Count Casual)
Fixed issue Vitruvius are still at 400 shards instead of 500 (Peuchy)
Fixed issue Wrong component for Morvenn Vahl (Iron II) (Gorgoth)

new.text: Added "Infinity" energy option to daily raids settings
Added more filters to Characters page and filter state is preserved in query params (Amenis, FMG, mason240)
subPoints: Added Min Hits, Max Hits, Attack Type, Movement, Distance filters

minor.text: Added stats of each owner to Guild Insights tooltips
Added Inventory and Remaining columns to Rank Lookup and MoW Lookup pages. Thanks to ijriims for contribution
Added another column to the Plan/Goals overview in the table view that show the number of days it takes for a character alone (trick010)
Included MoWs and characters shards on the shared roster page

bugFixes.text: Fixed issue with energy needed to unlock a char is not shown on goal card (Babidy04)

new.text: Added new collectable characters
subPoints: Xybia, Magus, unlockable in the ’Path of Ascension' event, starting October 13
Patermine, Genestealer Patriarch, unlockable in the first ‘Alien Majesty‘ event, starting November 3

new.text: Added new Campaign Battles: ‘Mirror Elite Saim-Hann’ part 4
Adjusted drop rate for Campaign random rewards to take into account the Mercy system
Added Genestealer Upgrades
Updated Snappa and Boss G stats after the rewORK
Added The Patermine LRE

bugFixes.text: Fixed Incorrect damage upgrade listed for Kharn (ZHovtiyLitsar)
Fixed Incorrect Visage of Death recipe (SeventhSun)

new.text: Updates for learn Guides feature
subPoints: Added new game modes: Legendary Event and Incursion
Prohibited Factions are filtered out automatically in the Guild Raids mode
Added total guides counter near the filter button

new.text: Added learn Guides feature. This is the first iteration for the feature so please share your feedback
subPoints: Find or create guides for specific game modes (Guild Raids, Tournament Arena, Guild Wars)
Anyone can view/share guides but only logged in users can create a guide
Guide will be moderated before being publicly available
Team in the guide can consist of 5 characters and 1 mow. Each slot can be turned into "flex" and fit up to 3 characters. MoW slot is optional

new.text: Added new collectable characters
subPoints: Titus, Primaris Lieutenant, unlockable in the first ‘Survival‘ event, starting September 1
Lucien, Death Company Intercessor, unlockable in the ‘Insanguination’ event, starting September 8

new.text: Added new Campaign Battles: ‘Mirror Elite Saim-Hann’ part 3
Added new logic to the server side that sure track conflict updates. It should resolve issue when you use planner on multiple devices and should prevent accidental data override

minor.text: Added popup that shows up when user is not logged in. You can still use app without account
Included MoWs data into Insights and Guild Insights
Updated icon for Multi-Spectrum Sensor Suite (falxnox)

bugFixes.text: Fixed issue when Daily Raids not accounting for Nested Crafted Components (ChargingFurret, Ardonomus)

new.text: Added possibility to update inventory after changing MoW abilities levels

new.text: Added dark mode

minor.text: Sort by rarity now takes into account stars (Ginrikuzuma)
Added amount of shards required for MoW

bugFixes.text: Fixed issue with Goals Detail list doesn't use all of your resolution space (Ginrikuzuma)
Fixed issue with Arrow Navigation Buttons do not save changes (Morpholine)
Fixed issue with Character's level is not auto-updated when editing rank or abilities via goal edit
Fixed issue with MoW doesn't show time taken for upgrades properly on the goals page (SeventhSun)
Fixed issue with recommended locations are not prioritizing higher nodes (Kinks)

new.text: Added MoWs to Who You Own page
Added new goal types:"MoW abilities" and "Character abilities"
Added MoW Lookup

minor.text: Updated images for some crafted upgrades. Thanks to KIVIY for contribution.
Updated stars visual to not extend beyond the character portrait and make the 5th one bigger in the middle like in the game. Thanks to Lëonaica for contribution. (LordLancelot)
Updated columns order in the material table on the Daily Raids to be: Goal/Inventory/Remaining (SeventhSun)
Added possibility to search for upgrade component of craftable upgrade in the Upgrade page (ijriims)
Added option to navigate Who You Own screen using back and forward arrows on the edit unit dialog (Hadoopalot)
Added "Component for" column to the upgrades table (KTA)
Added an indicator to display what the highest rarity cap is on the war zones (murky)
Added events calendar to home page (Mattias)

bugFixes.text: Fixed issue with "Shards per Onslaught" translates to default shard count on raid card at only half value (SeventhSun, Tani)
Fixed issue with staged upgrades as goals (Xenoblight)

new.text: Update the Daily Raids UI. Thanks to Tani and SeventhSun for ideas and feedback
subPoints: New view is more compact and provides better experience on mobile
Active goals moved to a dialog which is open by clicking button next to the filters icon
All details about raids are hidden in the 'Raids plan' expandable section
Added inventory section which will show only upgrades related to your active goals

new.text: Update the Daily Raids settings
subPoints: Added back the 'Characters shards energy' setting (ZHovtiyLitsar)
Added 'Locations selection' option
The 'Least energy' option will prioritize Elite campaigns locations

The 'Least time' option will prioritize Elite campaigns locations but will also try to add 'lower' locations if it improves overall time. This feature is not stable yet so please report any issue you'll notice while using it.
The 'All locations' option just recommend all locations you have unlocked
The 'Custom' option allows you to define locations priority based on upgrades rarity

new.text: Tani and KIVIY "promoted" to Contributors
subPoints: Tani thank you for supporting the app with your time and ideas
KIVIY thank you for finding upgrades images and promoting exitor for me😅

minor.text: Added team power visualization. Thanks to Lëonaica for contribution.
subPoints: You can open this dialog by clicking on the new button that beside 'Share' on Who You Own page and other similar pages

minor.text: Updated upgrades tables in the Daily Raids plan (SeventhSun)
subPoints: Added back 'Left' column
Removed 'Go to inventory' button
Estimates are expanded by default

minor.text: Added increment(+) and decrement(-) options to the inventory page (Tani)
subPoints: Enabled by default. Can be turned off by "Show -/+" toggle

bugFixes.text: Fixed issue with daily Raids continually adding more energy (BlatantFix, RotoR, Tani, diagonalplane)
Fixed Jain Zar G1 rank upgrades (Serious_w_Bear)

new.text: Added Kharn LRE planner
Updated Nandi's Dirty Dozen to May 2024 data
New Campaign Battles: ‘Elite Saim-Hann’ Part 2 and ‘Elite Saim-Hann’ Part 3

minor.text: Refactored daily raids and character upgrades for a better support of crafted upgrades
Update Tanksmasha according with rewORK

new.text: Updated goals grid view and added list view
Added more flexibility when setting "Ascend" or "Unlock" goals
subPoints: You can set goal to promote to specific stars e.g. to Blue star
You can specify whether you want to use only campaigns, only onslaught or both for farming shards

new.text: Added Shards raids section to the daily raids and updated "Active goals section" to include ascend/unlock goals

minor.text: Goals limit increased to 30
Added possibility to limit upgrades rarity for "Upgrade rank" goal (diagonalplane)
Updated rank lookup page

bugFixes.text: Fixed issue when adding guild members and deleting them makes the 'Import Link' feature leave blank slots (Vexen)
Fixed wrong upgrades count in the daily raids (ZHovtiyLitsar)
Fixed when applying upgrades after upgrading multiple ranks doesn't work on edit goal dialog (BlatantFix)
Fixed vindicta's upgrade item is incorrect for Iron III rank (Hadoopalot)
Fixed save Changes button is inactive if # of goals doesn't change on daily raids (SeventhSun)

minor.text: Added warning message that duplicated upgrades will be applied both at once

bugFixes.text: Fixed mobile layout issue, for daily raid UI (Tani)

new.text: Added amount of unused energy to the Raids section of the Daily raids page

minor.text: Added back possibility to edit goals on daily raids page (Kortesch)
Added back daily raids setting that are used to combined different campaigns types (RotoR, James V)

bugFixes.text: Fixed incorrect drop for Saim-Hann Mirror 63 (Sort of Purple)

new.text: Added "Slots" filter to the Daily Raids filter
subPoints: You can use it to filter locations by amount (3,4,5) of deployable characters

new.text: Added link to guilmates' roster page

minor.text: Updated more upgrades icons. Thanks to KIVIY

bugFixes.text: Fixed issue with 'i' not showing tooltip on daily raids settings on mobile (RotoR)

new.text: Added daily raids filter
subPoints: You can use it to tweak recommended locations based on your needs (e.g. you want to show only nodes that have Chaos as deployable factions)
You can filter by alliances (Chaos, Xenos, Imperial) and factions(Necrons, etc.) of allies or enemies
You can filter by campaign types (Elite, Mirror, etc.)
You can filter by upgrades rarity (Legendary, Epic, etc.)

new.text: UI adjustments for the Daily Raids page (await for more)
subPoints: Added navigation shortcut between goals and daily raids views
"Refresh estimate" button renamed to "Refresh" and moved to the top of the page
"Clear completed raids" button renamed to "Reset day" and moved to the top of the page
"Selected characters" section renamed to "Selected goals" and added characters' icons
"Materials" section splited into 3 sections: "In Progress materials", "Finished materials", "Blocked materials"
Added total number of raids and raids per day to the raids cards
Updated daily raids settings

new.text: Added guild war attack tokens tracking and guild overall data.
subPoints: Track how many war tokens you have left to use for attack enemy defences
This data is automatically shared with your guildmates
You can manually tweak wat tokens count on the "Deployment status" dialog or just rely on automatic decrement by 1 after deploying a team

new.text: Added guild members "Username" and "Share Token" validation
subPoints: You will be able to see the reason why user is invalid and ask your guildmates to provide proper data

new.text: Added new "Import link" option on the guild page
subPoints: The username and share token will be automatically parsed from the share link
It should help to deal with human error when manually entering username and share token

minor.text: Updated upgrades icons. Thanks to KIVIY

bugFixes.text: Fixed guild view/edit on mobile
Fixed issue with "Starts" on the character's stats screen (SeventhSun)

new.text: Updated Thank You cards with "Buy me a coffee" supporters
subPoints: You can get one for you but supporting the planner on https://www.buymeacoffee.com/tacticusplanner
Added discord server roles for supporters. Contact me if you are missing the role

new.text: Added possibly to access guildmates Tacticus planner data
subPoints: Your guildmates should enable roster sharing and share with you username and sharetoken which you should populate on the Input Guild page
You can populate guildmates data by importing Excel file
Your account data is not included automatically so make sure to populate your username and sharetoken as well

new.text: Added Guild Insights page
subPoints: You can view guild averaged roster data and who own which characters

new.text: Added Guild Waz zones page
subPoints: War zones layout is updated according to changes announced for the next season of guild wars
War zones can be reordered in the same fashion how it is done in the game
You can have up to 3 war zones layout
You can view guildmates potential for each difficult and assign them to specific zones

minor.text: On the character's details dialog when rarity is changed the stars will be auto-adjusted accordingly. Thanks to NickReinlein for contribution
Refined "power/potential" calculation formula to scale better for rank upgrades. Thanks to Lëonaica for contribution
subPoints: 40k is ultimate power now and is a maximum for each character when character has Diamond III rank, Blue star and both abilities at level 50

minor.text: Updated icon for Righteous Candle (SeventhSun)

bugFixes.text: Fixed Indomitus Mirror Elite 4 reward (SeventhSun)
Fixed Saim-Hann Elite 5 reward (SeventhSun)
Fixed issue with calendar days are wrong by 1 day too many (Tani)

new.text: Added option to support the planner with the "Buy me a coffee" service
subPoints: Consider supporting the Planner with some "troopers". It will help make the Planner a better place for everyone

minor.text: On the "Campaigns Progress" page maxed out campaigns will be greyed out

bugFixes.text: Fixed teams reordering on the guild war offense planner (Kinks)
Fixed bug on the daily raids with selected character when rank point 5 was not accounted after refreshing estimate
Fixed Thad S2-S3 upgrade (BlatantFix)

new.text: Added deployment status tracking for Guild War offense teams and specific characters

subPoints: Added "Zone difficulty" selector instead of BF level and Section selectors

new.text: General updates to align the planner with the 1.17 Tacticus update

bugFixes.text: Fix issue with inventory items being cropped when alphabet letters are displayed in mobile (Tani)
Fixed Month language on goals/daily raids pages (markRom)

new.text: Added Guild War planner for Offense and Defense
subPoints: The planner are meant to be used each guild player. The planner for a Guild Leaders to plan battlefield layout and players positions will be added later
On the Defense planner player can setup up to 5 teams with rarity caps based on selected battlefield level and section
On the Offense planner player can setup up to 10 teams with custom rarity caps

minor.text: Updated nav for mobile

new.text: New thank you card for SeventhSun's contribution
Added "Rank Point Five" toggle when setting/editing an upgrade rank goal (Edward H)
subPoints:
When you reach a target upgrade rank, you are immediately able to apply the top row of three upgrades.
If you toggle on the "Rank Point Five" switch then these upgrades will be included in your daily raids plan

new.text: Added "Ignore Rank/Rarity restrictions" toggle when setting an upgrade rank goal
subPoints: If you toggle on this switch then you will be able to set Upgrade Rank goal for a character you have not unlocked or ascended to required rarity yet

new.text: Added "Show alphabet" toggle on the Inventory page (Adj)

subPoints: Click on the 'i' icon navigate user to the Wiki page of respective faction (NPC units block)

new.text: Added data about # of deployed characters in specific battle (ForgottenSaber, Szarekh)
subPoints: Added "Slots" column. Which will be empty if there could be deployed 5 characters in a battle otherwise 3 or 4
Some Mirror Elite campaigns (like Indomitus Mirror Elite and Ocatarius Mirror Elite) have 5 slots in all battles
